#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{   int a;
    cin>>a;
    while(a--)
    {
     int m;
     cin>>m;
     char n[m][101];
     char o[101];
    for(int i=0;i<m;i++)
     {
         scanf("%s",n[i]);

     }
    scanf("%s",o);

    int low=0,mid;
    int high=m-1;
    while(low<=high)
    {
       mid=(low+high)/2;
       if(strcmp(n[mid],o)<0)
        low=mid+1;
       else if(strcmp(n[mid],o)>0)
        high=mid-1;
       else
        {
        cout<<"yes"<<endl;
        break;
        }
    }
    if(low>high)
    {
        cout<<"no"<<endl;
    }

    }
return 0;
}
